line_1: I'm leaving the world ere I'm forty and five;
line_2: Tom, see by what courses I've shorten'd my life,

line_1: To set a distich upon six and five,
line_2: At Westminster, where little poets strive

line_1: I'm sure you'd mattadores, so give us five;
line_2: Now this may turn my luck, and I may thrive.
